p: For this study 966 HIV-1 subtype B samples collected from patients with defined transmission route for the purpose of genotypic drug resistance analyses were used. Patients were linked to care in 9 of 17 Polish HIV treatment centres (Białystok, Bydgoszcz, Gdańsk, Łódź, Kraków, Poznan, Szczecin, Wroclaw, Zielona Gora). Sequencing was performed at the Clinical Laboratory at the Department of Infectious, Tropical Diseases and Acquired Immune Deficiency, Pomeranian Medical University in Szczecin, Poland.
